name: Guava
description: Guavas are incredibly delicious and packed with nutrients. This tropical fruit is low in calories, loaded with fiber, and an excellent addition to a healthy diet. Many studies also support the benefits of guava leaf extracts, which are taken as dietary supplements. Together, guava fruit and leaf extracts may boost your heart health, digestion, and immune system, in addition to other benefits. [Source: www.healthline.com] Disclaimer: Please note that the image is used for presentation purposes only. Actual product may slightly defer.
